title: GET /health
text:
[ENDPOINT] GET /health
summary: Health
operationId: health_health_get
responses:
- 200: Successful Response
 schema:
 type: object

title: POST /reset
text:
[ENDPOINT] POST /reset
summary: Reset
operationId: reset_reset_post
responses:
- 200: Successful Response
 schema:
 type: object

title: POST /ingest/openapi
text:
[ENDPOINT] POST /ingest/openapi
summary: Ingest Openapi
operationId: ingest_openapi_ingest_openapi_post
requestBody:
ref: #/components/schemas/IngestRequest
responses:
- 200: Successful Response
 schema:
 ref: #/components/schemas/IngestResponse
- 422: Validation Error
 schema:
 ref: #/components/schemas/HTTPValidationError

title: POST /chat
text:
[ENDPOINT] POST /chat
summary: Chat
operationId: chat_chat_post
requestBody:
ref: #/components/schemas/ChatRequest
responses:
- 200: Successful Response
 schema:
 ref: #/components/schemas/ChatResponse
- 422: Validation Error
 schema:
 ref: #/components/schemas/HTTPValidationError

title: SCHEMA ChatRequest
text:
[SCHEMA] ChatRequest
type: object
fields:
- query: string (required)
- top_k: integer
- threshold: number
- force_llm: boolean

title: SCHEMA ChatResponse
text:
[SCHEMA] ChatResponse
type: object
fields:
- query: string (required)
- used_llm: boolean (required)
- threshold: number (required)
- top_score: number (required)
- answer: string (required)
- citations: array (required)

title: SCHEMA HTTPValidationError
text:
[SCHEMA] HTTPValidationError
type: object
fields:
- detail: array

title: SCHEMA IngestRequest
text:
[SCHEMA] IngestRequest
type: object
fields:
- url: string (required) OpenAPI 스펙 URL 또는 Swagger UI URL
- headers: object 스펙 fetch 시 사용할 헤더
- include_operations: boolean
- include_schemas: boolean
- max_text_chars: integer

title: SCHEMA IngestResponse
text:
[SCHEMA] IngestResponse
type: object
fields:
- resolved_spec_url: string (required)
- docs: integer (required)
- dim: integer (required)
- provider: string (required)

title: SCHEMA ValidationError
text:
[SCHEMA] ValidationError
type: object
fields:
- loc: array (required)
- msg: string (required)
- type: string (required)
